评论概述: Elegant Case fits this necklace box perfectly
评论详情: Fabulous necklace box that for the price I paid was way more than I ever expected it to be.  It comes with a nice sturdy cardboard outside box as well, which is also very nice, though my outside box was slightly crushed on the corner, most likely during delivery.  The size of this necklace box is large, so you could easily fit other pieces of jewelry inside it beyond just a necklace, though the other pieces could slide around in the box, as there would be no way to secure them.  This necklace box would make even a inexpensive piece of costume jewelry look wonderful.  If I needed a necklace box of this size again, I would not hesitate to purchase this item again.
It was beautiful and my earrings fit perfectly in it.

This is an affordable and elegant way to present or store a ring.  The slot is snug enough to accommodate the thinnest band and the price point is excellent.  A great way to present the ring to your loved one in the fall months or if this is one of their fave colors or even to match the stone on the ring.  In the photos this looks slightly more on the pink or magenta side but it is a true burgundy which is a slightly browner red on the spectrum.  It arrives in a sturdy gift box. Lovely and recommended.
